name: Moldoveanu Peak Trail
description: Challenging hike to Romania's highest peak at 2,544m. Stunning alpine views and diverse terrain.

name: Transfăgărășan Highway
description: Epic motorcycle ride on one of the most scenic roads in the world. Winding mountain passes with breathtaking views.

name: Bucegi Plateau Loop
description: Scenic circular route through meadows and rock formations. Perfect for a day hike with moderate elevation gain.

name: Transalpina Mountain Road
description: High-altitude motorcycle adventure through the Parâng Mountains. Long sweeping curves and panoramic vistas.

name: Omu Peak via Babele
description: Classic route passing the famous Babele rock formations. Mix of technical sections and easy walking paths.

name: Cheile Turzii Canyon Ride
description: Winding roads through dramatic limestone canyon. Great mix of technical riding and scenic stops.

name: Piatra Craiului Ridge
description: Exposed ridge walk with spectacular views. Requires good weather and solid hiking experience.

name: Danube Delta Exploration
description: Peaceful ride through unique delta landscapes. Combine with boat trips for a complete experience.
